0.text: Innate - Icebreaker: Enemies  stunned by Sejuani are marked Frozen for the disable's duration. Sejuani's next basic attack or ability against a Frozen enemy will consume the mark to deal bonus magic damage equal to 10% of their maximum health, capped at 300 against epic monsters.
0.html: Innate - Icebreaker: Enemies stunned by Sejuani are marked Frozen for the disable's duration. Sejuani's next basic attack or ability against a Frozen enemy will consume the mark to deal bonus magic damage equal to 10% of their maximum health, capped at 300 against epic monsters.
markedPassages: stunned

1.text: Innate - Frost Armor: Sejuani gains Frost Armor, which lingers for 3 seconds after taking damage from enemy  champions or  monsters. She restores it after 12 − 6 (based on level) without taking damage from them.
1.html: Innate - Frost Armor: Sejuani gains Frost Armor, which lingers for 3 seconds after taking damage from enemy champions or monsters. She restores it after 12 − 6 (based on level) without taking damage from them.
markedPassages: champions
monsters

2.text: Frost Armor: Sejuani gains  slow immunity,  cripple immunity,  10 (+ 50% bonus armor) bonus armor, and  10 (+ 50% bonus magic resistance) bonus magic resistance.
2.html: Frost Armor: Sejuani gains slow immunity, cripple immunity,  10 (+ 50% bonus armor) bonus armor, and  10 (+ 50% bonus magic resistance) bonus magic resistance.
markedPassages: slow immunity
cripple immunity
10 (+ 50% bonus armor) bonus armor
10 (+ 50% bonus magic resistance) bonus magic resistance
10 (+ 50% bonus magic resistance) bonus magic resistance
10 (+ 50% bonus magic resistance) bonus magic resistance

0.text: Active:  Bristle  dashes to the target location until he collides with an enemy  champion, dealing magic damage to enemies he she passes through and  knocking them up for 0.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Bristle dashes to the target location until he collides with an enemy champion, dealing magic damage to enemies he she passes through and knocking them up for 0.5 seconds.
markedPassages: Bristle
dashes
champion
knocking them up

1.text: Sejuani can cast any of her abilities during the dash. Arctic Assault will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
1.html: Sejuani can cast any of her abilities during the dash. Arctic Assault will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: After 0.25 seconds into the cast time, Sejuani swings her flail in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit and  knocks back  minions and  monsters hit.
0.html: Active: After 0.25 seconds into the cast time, Sejuani swings her flail in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit and knocks back minions and monsters hit.
markedPassages: knocks back
minions
monsters

1.text: After the cast time, Sejuani lashes out with her flail in a line in the same direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 75% for 0.25 seconds.
1.html: After the cast time, Sejuani lashes out with her flail in a line in the same direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 75% for 0.25 seconds.
markedPassages: slowing

2.text: Sejuani can move during Winter's Wrath's cast time.
2.html: Sejuani can move during Winter's Wrath's cast time.

0.text: Passive:  Winter's Wrath and both Sejuani's and nearby allied  melee champions' attacks  on-hit apply stacks of Frost to enemy  champions, medium / large  monsters and large  minions for 5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 4 times. Enemies hit by Permafrost or  Glacial Prison's bola have all of their Frost stacks consumed and cannot be affected by Frost for 10 seconds. Sejuani can cast Permafrost against an enemy with 4 stacks.
0.html:
Passive: Winter's Wrath and both Sejuani's and nearby allied melee champions' attacks on-hit apply stacks of Frost to enemy champions, medium / large monsters and large minions for 5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 4 times. Enemies hit by Permafrost or Glacial Prison's bola have all of their Frost stacks consumed and cannot be affected by Frost for 10 seconds.

Sejuani can cast Permafrost against an enemy with 4 stacks.
markedPassages: Winter's Wrath
melee
on-hit
champions
monsters
minions
Glacial Prison's

1.text: Active: Sejuani hurls a trap at the  visible enemy with 4 stacks of Frost closest to the cursor, which upon arrival deals magic damage,  knocks them down, and  stuns them for 1 second.
1.html: Active: Sejuani hurls a trap at the visible enemy with 4 stacks of Frost closest to the cursor, which upon arrival deals magic damage, knocks them down, and stuns them for 1 second.
markedPassages: visible
knocks them down
stuns

2.text: Permafrost  resets Sejuani's basic attack timer.
2.html: Permafrost resets Sejuani's basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets

0.text: Active: Sejuani throws an ice bola in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing magic damage and  stunning them for 1 second.
0.html: Active: Sejuani throws an ice bola in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing magic damage and stunning them for 1 second.
markedPassages: stunning

1.text: If the bola travels over 400 units, it becomes empowered to detonate upon reaching maximum range or hitting an enemy champion, dealing increased damage and  stunning for 1.5 seconds instead. For the same duration, a frost storm is created that  slows enemies within by 30% and grants  sight of the area in a smaller radius.
1.html: If the bola travels over 400 units, it becomes empowered to detonate upon reaching maximum range or hitting an enemy champion, dealing increased damage and stunning for 1.5 seconds instead. For the same duration, a frost storm is created that slows enemies within by 30% and grants sight of the area in a smaller radius.
markedPassages: stunning
slows
sight

2.text: Afterwards, the storm shatters to deal magic damage to enemies hit and  slow them by 80% for 1 second, as well as  revealing them and granting  sight of the area for 0.5 seconds.
2.html: Afterwards, the storm shatters to deal magic damage to enemies hit and slow them by 80% for 1 second, as well as revealing them and granting sight of the area for 0.5 seconds.
markedPassages: slow
revealing
sight

3.text: The enemy hit by the bola is not affected by the storm's effects.
3.html: The enemy hit by the bola is not affected by the storm's effects.

abilities.concerningText: Active:  Bristle  dashes to the target location until he collides with an enemy  champion, dealing magic damage to enemies he she passes through and  knocking them up for 0.5 seconds.
Active: After 0.25 seconds into the cast time, Sejuani swings her flail in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit and  knocks back  minions and  monsters hit.
After the cast time, Sejuani lashes out with her flail in a line in the same direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 75% for 0.25 seconds.
After the cast time, Sejuani lashes out with her flail in a line in the same direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 75% for 0.25 seconds.
Active: Sejuani hurls a trap at the  visible enemy with 4 stacks of Frost closest to the cursor, which upon arrival deals magic damage,  knocks them down, and  stuns them for 1 second.
Active: Sejuani throws an ice bola in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing magic damage and  stunning them for 1 second.

If the bola travels over 400 units, it becomes empowered to detonate upon reaching maximum range or hitting an enemy champion, dealing increased damage and  stunning for 1.5 seconds instead. For the same duration, a frost storm is created that  slows enemies within by 30% and grants  sight of the area in a smaller radius.
Afterwards, the storm shatters to deal magic damage to enemies hit and  slow them by 80% for 1 second, as well as  revealing them and granting  sight of the area for 0.5 seconds.
Active:  Bristle  dashes to the target location until he collides with an enemy  champion, dealing magic damage to enemies he she passes through and  knocking them up for 0.5 seconds.
Active: After 0.25 seconds into the cast time, Sejuani swings her flail in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit and  knocks back  minions and  monsters hit.
After the cast time, Sejuani lashes out with her flail in a line in the same direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 75% for 0.25 seconds.
After the cast time, Sejuani lashes out with her flail in a line in the same direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 75% for 0.25 seconds.
Active: Sejuani hurls a trap at the  visible enemy with 4 stacks of Frost closest to the cursor, which upon arrival deals magic damage,  knocks them down, and  stuns them for 1 second.
Active: Sejuani throws an ice bola in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing magic damage and  stunning them for 1 second.

If the bola travels over 400 units, it becomes empowered to detonate upon reaching maximum range or hitting an enemy champion, dealing increased damage and  stunning for 1.5 seconds instead. For the same duration, a frost storm is created that  slows enemies within by 30% and grants  sight of the area in a smaller radius.
Afterwards, the storm shatters to deal magic damage to enemies hit and  slow them by 80% for 1 second, as well as  revealing them and granting  sight of the area for 0.5 seconds.
Active:  Bristle  dashes to the target location until he collides with an enemy  champion, dealing magic damage to enemies he she passes through and  knocking them up for 0.5 seconds.
Active: After 0.25 seconds into the cast time, Sejuani swings her flail in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit and  knocks back  minions and  monsters hit.
After the cast time, Sejuani lashes out with her flail in a line in the same direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 75% for 0.25 seconds.
After the cast time, Sejuani lashes out with her flail in a line in the same direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 75% for 0.25 seconds.
Active: Sejuani hurls a trap at the  visible enemy with 4 stacks of Frost closest to the cursor, which upon arrival deals magic damage,  knocks them down, and  stuns them for 1 second.
Active: Sejuani throws an ice bola in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing magic damage and  stunning them for 1 second.

If the bola travels over 400 units, it becomes empowered to detonate upon reaching maximum range or hitting an enemy champion, dealing increased damage and  stunning for 1.5 seconds instead. For the same duration, a frost storm is created that  slows enemies within by 30% and grants  sight of the area in a smaller radius.
Afterwards, the storm shatters to deal magic damage to enemies hit and  slow them by 80% for 1 second, as well as  revealing them and granting  sight of the area for 0.5 seconds.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 health
+6 health per 5 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Endure: After taking damage from a champion or large monster, gain health regeneration equal to 0 − 40 (based on current missing health) health over 8 seconds. Reduced to「 66% effectiveness 」「 0 − 26.4 (based on current missing health) 」 on ranged champions or when triggered by area of effect, damage over time, or proc.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

Keywords

Regenerates 4 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 120 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 4 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 120 health.

Keywords

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+450 health
+25 armor
+25 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within 325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.
Unique – Snowbind: Basic attacks create a 250 radius frost field around the target that lasts for 1.5 seconds and deals ( 12 − 85 / 6 − 42.5) (based on level) magic damage to all enemies inside initially and slows all enemies within by ( 25% / 12.5%) (+ ( 4% / 2%) per 1000 maximum health) for 1.5 seconds (( 4 / 6) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 100 bonus health and 6% increased size.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IMMOLATE: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within  325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  1050

  • chilly mittens

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability haste
+350 health
+500 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants bonus health equal to 8% maximum mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Consumes a charge on-hit and whenever affecting an enemy or ally with an ability to grant 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 for champion targets, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Fimbulwinter at +360 mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants bonus health equal to 8% maximum mana.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  1100

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+350 health
+60 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Thorns: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THORNS: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.  Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

passive.originText: UNIQUE – IMMOLATE: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. stats.originHTML:

+5% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Absorb: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
Unique – Dissipate: While at 6 stacks of Steadfast, gain 10% bonus movement speed and reduce all incoming magic damage by 25%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ABSORB: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming  immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
